ActJudges Act
SubjectAnn Isaac ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Julius A. Isaac
PrecisGranting of an annuity to ANN ISAAC, widow of the Hon. Julius A. Isaac, a Judge of the Federal Court of Appeal, effective July 17, 2011.
